snippet: The newest leak will force the operator of the nuclear plant in Japan to postpone the removal of contaminated water for several days.
abstract: Tokyo Electric Power Co, operator of crippled Fukushima nuclear plant, postpones removal of highly contaminated water from leaking underground storage pool at plant for several days after it finds yet another leak.
lead_paragraph: The newest leak will force the operator of the nuclear plant in Japan to postpone the removal of contaminated water for several days.

headline.seo: New Leak Found at Fukushima Nuclear Plant
headline.main: Small Leak Is Discovered at Plant in Fukushima
headline.print_headline: Small Leak Is Discovered At Plant In Fukushima
